history.proof: intros n m. induction n as [|p]. - intros H. qsimpl time: 1 use: N. apply Pos.peano_ind; try easy. apply le_not_gt in H. qsimpl time: 1 use: N. + sauto lq: on depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros H. destruct m as [|q]. -- simpl in H. inversion H. -- simpl in H. apply Pos2Nat.inj_lt in H. apply Pos.compare_lt_iff in H. qsimpl time: 1 use: N.

original: intros n m. induction n as [|p]. - intros H. apply N.le_0_l in H. apply Nnot_lt_incl; try easy. apply le_not_gt in H. unfold N.lt in H. apply H. - intros H. destruct m as [|q]. -- simpl in H. inversion H. -- simpl in H. apply Pos2Nat.inj_lt in H. apply Pos.compare_lt_iff in H. rewrite <- N2Nat.inj_succ in H. simpl. apply Pos.lt_trans with (m := q) in H. ++ apply Pos.lt_is_lt_bool in H. unfold N.lt. simpl. apply Pos2Nat.inj_lt. apply H. ++ apply Pos.lt_trans with (m := p); auto.
